channel.title: How do i make items auto spawn in certain area
channel.description:
all i want is to items to auto spawn on a table can any one help me? Thnks :)[br][size=1]Posted on: May 19, 2007, 09:44:15 PM[/size][hr][quote="the rel pure"]all i want is to items to auto spawn on a table can any one help me? Thnks :)[/quote]
lol uhm sorry dw i figured it out lol

item.title: How do i make items auto spawn in certain area
item.dc:creator: @The_Wise_Guy .Kaboom
item.description:
@The_Wise_Guy wrote:

Itemspawnpoints.java

Add one of these

ItemHandler.addItem(ITEMID, XXXX, YYYY, AMOUNT#, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // Whatever

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make items auto spawn in certain area
